set(
    HEADERS
    error_handling.inc
    error_handling.hpp
    index.inc
    index.hpp
    math_operations.hpp
    named_type.inc
    named_type.hpp
    numeric_operations.inc
    numeric_operations.hpp
    std_container_operations.inc
    std_container_operations.hpp
    string_operations.inc
    string_operations.hpp
    system_operations.hpp
    system_operations.inc
)

set(
    SOURCES
    math_operations.cpp
    string_operations.cpp
    system_operations.cpp
#
    ${HEADERS}
)
set_source_files_properties(${HEADERS} PROPERTIES LANGUAGE CXX HEADER_FILE_ONLY TRUE)

add_library(utilities ${SOURCES})
target_include_directories(utilities PUBLIC ${INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES})
target_compile_definitions(utilities INTERFACE ${COMPILE_DEFINITIONS})
target_compile_options(utilities PRIVATE ${COMPILE_OPTIONS})

install(
        TARGETS utilities
        EXPORT ${targets_export_name}
        LIBRARY DESTINATION ${library_install_directory}
        ARCHIVE DESTINATION ${library_install_directory}/static
        RUNTIME DESTINATION ${executable_install_directory}
        INCLUDES DESTINATION ${include_install_directory}
)

install(FILES ${HEADERS} DESTINATION ${include_install_directory_headers}/Sources/Utilities)
